channel.title: Lifestyle on Algorithmic!
channel.description: Recent content in Lifestyle on Algorithmic!

item.title: Eat Well and Sleep
item.description: Sleep and diet have a huge effect on decision-making12, in a way that’s really difficult to recognize in the moment. When you’re tired, the chocolate looks more tempting than the running shoes; when your blood sugar is low, the TV looks more tempting than the job applications. If you’re sleep-deprived and you’re eating poorly, then trying to achieve an end goal is like running a marathon with a pair of koalas stubbornly wrapped around your legs.
